original_text: A writing of Hezekiah king of Judah, after he had been sick and had recovered from his sickness:
korean_text: 유다 왕 히스기야가 병들었다가 그의 병이 나은 때에 기록한 글이 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: A writing of Hezekiah king of Judah,
after he had been sick and had recovered from his sickness:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 병들었다가 그 병에서 나은 후에:
